channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country data type maps what currencies are valid for specific countries. US Dollars are valid from any country, but other currencies are only available to customers in certain countries. Local countryId A unique identifier for the related country. Type: integer currencyId A unique identifier for the related currency. Type: integer id A unique identifier for a map between a country and currency.
